Question.Subject: I NEED HELP ON FORMSPRING?
Question.Content: Okay, so yesterday i made a formspring account but i've gone and aleady forgetten my password!! I tried guessing it then clicked reset and then i typed in my name and it said they have sent me an email so i can reset it. No email. Tried again. No email. Tried AGAIN. No email. I checked my junk, no email. What do you think is wrongg?
Question.ChosenAnswer: The same thing happened to me, but I had set it up with Face book as well, So if you go onto the log in page, you can hit sign in with face book and if that helps I hope it does.

Answer.Content: The same thing happened to me, but I had set it up with Face book as well, So if you go onto the log in page, you can hit sign in with face book and if that helps I hope it does.
